item.title: Aliases
item.description: I’m also known as Hugo Omar Rivera Calzadillas, Hugo O Rivera Calzadillas, and Hugo Rivera. More contact info.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You may contact me at: hugo аt roguh.com rivera.hugo2319 аt gmail.com text or call +1 (774) 354-9367 roguh (ro-KOO) is my screen name. The name is inspired by Rokurōta Makabe, a character in one of my favorite movies. linkedin.com/in/roguh here’s an interesting google search result

item.title: Darkrose and Diamond
item.description: Darkrose and Diamond A Boat Song from West Havnor Where my love is going There will I go. Where his boat is rowing I will row. We will laugh together, Together we will cry. If he lives I will live, If he dies I die. Where my love is going There will I go. Where his boat is rowing I will row. IN THE WEST OF HAVNOR, among hills forested with oak and chestnut, is the town of Glade.

item.title: Biography
item.description: Personal Interests My hobbies and interests are varied. Some of them are keeping up-to-date on infosec, tech, science, ecological, and geopolitical news; reading sci-fi, literature, and historical books in Spanish and English; hiking; cycling; and traveling. Education and career While studying CS at the Santa Fe Community College, I taught myself enough Haskell to write most of a simple compiler for Haskell’s intermediate language Core. I studied computer science and mathematics at the majestic New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology where I graduated with high honors.

item.title: Career
item.description: I’m a software engineer interested in developing tomorrow’s essential technology. I am fascinated by the growth stage of startups, specifically the software side. I built software that operates directly on EHRs (electronic health records). It is used by doctors and other health practitioners at AgileMD. I build software for the Future of Pharmacy Infrastructure at Truepill, “the AWS for pharmacies” backed by Initialized Capital. See my LinkedIn for current position(s).

item.title: New Mexico
item.description: The 47th state in the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Known for lowriders, U+1F47Ds, green chile, beautiful wilderness, and Meow Wolf’s House of Eternal Return.

item.title: USHANKA
item.description: the angles cut me when i try to think it feels like thinking through cheese wire there’s no feeling but the no-feeling hurts it’s cold and it hurts the maze is sharp on my mind. the angles cut me when i try to think.
